item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music (Non-US)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Madness - It Must Be Love
item.description:
Ukulele play along
It Must Be Love - Madness Written by Labi Siffre
Using the chords: Am A7 Bm C D Dm D7 Em E7 G (Some chords have been simplified for teaching purposes) Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elton John - Crocodile Rock (Remastered)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Crocodile Rock - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: A7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Ciara - Beauty Marks
item.description: For Educational Use. Chords used in this song: F, A7, Gm, Dm, G7, C, B flat, and Am

item.title: Kacey Musgraves - Rainbow
item.description: For Educational Use. Chords Used: F, Dm, B flat, C A7, G7, and G

item.title: Jeff Beck - Hi Ho Silver Lining
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Hi Ho Silver Lining - Jeff Beck Written by Scott English and Larry Weiss
Using the chords: A7 C D D7 G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU (single strums for intro)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Varios Artistas - Thinking out Loud
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Thinking Out Loud - Ed Sheeran
Using the chords: A A7 Bm D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: (slow) DU (slow) DU (fast) DU but worth trying your own too.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Studio bandet - Deep on the heart of texas
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Deep In The Heart Of Texas on the ukulele by American Patriots. The chords used are D A7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos
